publication.title: Rectangular tiling in multidimensional arrays
publication.abstract: We study the following tiling problem in d dimensions: given a d-dimensional rectangular array of non-negative numbers and an integer p, partition the array into at most p rectangular subarrays so that the maximum weight of any subarray is minimized; the weight of a subarray is the sum of its elements. The rectangular tiling problem is motivated by applications in

publication.title: Tracking moving devices with the cricket location system
publication.jconf: International Conference on Mobile Systems, Applications, and Services
publication.keyword: Distance Estimation;Hybrid Approach;Location Awareness;Mobile Device;Mobile Systems;Pervasive Computing;
publication.abstract: We study the problem of tracking a moving device under two indoor location architectures: an active mobile architecture and a passive mobile architecture. In the former, the infrastructure has receivers at known locations, which estimate distances to a mobile device based on an active transmission from the device. In the latter, the infrastructure has active beacons that periodically transmit signals
